pages.app.oldBrowserAlert.message: It looks like you're using an old browser that isn't supported. Some functionality may not work or may be broken. Please switch to a modern browser such as Firefox for full functionality.
pages.welcome.selfhostSubtitle: An unofficial selfhosted version of RecipeSage.com, a free recipe keeper, meal planner, and shopping list organizer for Web, IOS, and Android
pages.welcome.title: All of your recipes in one place
pages.welcome.subtitle: A free recipe keeper, meal planner, and shopping list organizer for Web, IOS, and Android
pages.welcome.description.1: RecipeSage is a free (donation based & open source) personal recipe keeper, meal planner, and shopping list manager for Web, IOS, and Android.
pages.welcome.description.2: Quickly capture and save recipes from any website simply by entering the website URL. Sync your recipes, meal plans, and shopping lists between all of your devices. Share your recipes, shopping lists, and meal plans with family and friends.
pages.welcome.description.features.1.des: Create a recipe simply by punching in a web URL
pages.welcome.description.features.2.des: Search every field within your recipes including misspellings and similar words
pages.welcome.description.features.3.des: Tag your recipes and filter by tags
pages.welcome.description.features.4.des: Schedule your meals interactively, quickly and easily
pages.welcome.description.features.5.des: Automatically categorized and intelligently grouped - add your recipes directly to a shopping list and similar items will be combined
pages.welcome.description.features.6.des: Share your recipes, collaborate on meal plans and shopping lists with your family or friends
pages.welcome.description.features.7.des: Supports Pepperplate, Living Cookbook, and Paprika
pages.welcome.description.features.8.des: Back up your recipes in multiple formats for data portability
pages.welcome.description.cta.4: Available on desktop and all mobile devices
pages.auth.selfhostWarning: Note: This is a selfhosted version of RecipeSage and is therefore not associated with RecipeSage.com or any of the accounts located on the main site.
pages.auth.welcome.login.sub: Please login with your account details below.
pages.auth.welcome.register.sub1: We need a few details to create your account.
pages.auth.welcome.register.sub2: After this, you'll be set up and ready to go.
pages.auth.input.name: Full Name or Nickname
pages.auth.selfhostWarning2: Make sure you trust the site owner of this selfhost copy
pages.auth.error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
pages.auth.error.noName: Please enter a name (you can enter a nickname!)
pages.auth.error.passwordLength: Please enter a password at least 6 characters long.
pages.auth.error.passwordMatch: The password and confirmation you entered do not match.
pages.auth.error.incorrectLogin: It looks like that email or password isn't correct.
pages.auth.error.emailTaken: An account with that email address already exists.
pages.auth.forgot.toast: If there is a RecipeSage account associated with that email address, you should receive a password reset link within the next few minutes.

pages.home.errors.noRecipes.message4: You can also import recipes from other platforms.

pages.home.errors.noRecipes.message6: You can install the clip tool extension on desktop browsers:
pages.home.errors.noRecipes.message7: For detailed tutorials for how to use the app, visit the documentation
pages.home.errors.inboxEmpty.message2: When someone sends you a recipe, it will show up here!
pages.home.errors.noResultsFilters: No recipes matching the current filters
pages.home.errors.noSearchResults.messag: Title, description, source, ingredients, instructions, and notes.
pages.home.addLabel.message: Enter the name for the label
pages.home.deleteSelected.message: This will permanently delete the selected recipes from your account. This action is irreversible.
This will permanently delete the selected recipes from your account. This action is irreversible. The following recipes will be deleted: {{recipeNames}}
pages.homeSearchFilterPopover.title: Search Filters
pages.homeSearchFilterPopover.optionsHid: Note: some options are hidden, since this is a shared collection
pages.notfound.title: Page Not Found
pages.notfound.error.title: Page Not Found!
pages.notfound.error.message1: It looks like the page you are looking for doesn't exist.
pages.notfound.error.message2: Check to see if you typed the URL correctly.
pages.notfound.error.message3: If you're still having trouble, or if somewhere in the app took you here, please contact me.
pages.notfound.error.goHome: Click here to go to your recipes

pages.homepopover.warning.optionsHidden: Note: some options are hidden, since this is a shared collection
pages.homepopover.labelNull: You don't have any labels. You can create labels on the recipe details page.
pages.recipeDetails.sentBy: This recipe was sent to you by {{name}}
pages.recipeDetails.sentByAction: Add this recipe to your recipes by clicking the button at the bottom of the page.
pages.recipeDetails.saveToMyRecipes: Save This Recipe to My Recipes
pages.recipeDetails.doesNotBelongToYou: This recipe does not belong to you yet.
pages.recipeDetails.requiresAccountToSav: Create an account or login to save this recipe to your collection.
pages.recipeDetails.delete.message: This will permanently delete the recipe from your account. This action is irreversible.
pages.recipeDetails.cloned: The recipe has been saved to your account
pages.about.title: About & Support
pages.contact.title: Contact Me
pages.contact.subtitle: Contact Info
pages.contact.pleaseUserGuide: For any questions, please refer to the user guide before emailing:
pages.contact.emailMe: For any issues, bugs, or feature suggestions, you can email me at
pages.contribute.title: Contribute
pages.contribute.subtitle: Contribute to RecipeSage
pages.contribute.mission: My goal is to keep RecipeSage open to anyone, without burdening the experience with ads.
pages.contribute.purpose: However, as RecipeSage grows, hosting costs for servers and images begin to add up.
pages.contribute.monthly.description: You will unlock bonus features for the months that you are subscribed.
pages.contribute.oneTime.description: You will unlock bonus features for one year.
pages.contribute.bonus.title: As a thank you to those who make RecipeSage possible, your contributions will unlock some bonus features for your account. You will be able to:
pages.contribute.bonus.feature.2: Upload multiple images for each recipe
pages.contribute.bonus.reason: Bonus features features are accessible only to contributors because these particular features are costly for me to host.
pages.contribute.cta.1: I originally created RecipeSage for my own family to host recipes we enjoy sharing. Since then, RecipeSage has grown into a fully-fledged open source project.
pages.contribute.cta.2: Please consider contributing toward the ongoing maintenance of RecipeSage.
pages.contribute.minimum: Unfortunately the minimum amount is ${{amount}} due to transaction fees - apologies
pages.contributeThankYou.title: Thank You!
pages.contributeThankYou.thanks: Thank you for being a part of the RecipeSage family and helping to keep it alive!
pages.contributeThankYou.bonus: Bonus features should be unlocked for your account shortly.
pages.contributeThankYou.questions: Please feel free to contact me with any questions, concerns or comments.
pages.contributeCancel.title: We need your help!
pages.contributeCancel.cta.1: RecipeSage is donation based - every contribution helps!
pages.contributeCancel.cta.2: Unfortunately, RecipeSage doesn't get many donations since it is a fairly small platform.
pages.contributeCancel.cta.3: In order to keep things free while paying for server costs, we need your help.
pages.contributeCancel.cta.4: Please reconsider - your contribution is truly appreciated!
pages.downloadAndInstall.title: Download & Install
pages.downloadAndInstall.subtitle: RecipeSage Application
pages.downloadAndInstall.done: This will install RecipeSage as a native application on your device.
pages.downloadAndInstall.android.title: Android Device
pages.downloadAndInstall.android.step.2: Open the browser menu via a button in your browser that looks like this:
pages.downloadAndInstall.ios.title: Apple Mobile Device
pages.downloadAndInstall.ios.instruction: To install RecipeSage on Apple Mobile Devices (IOS):
pages.downloadAndInstall.ios.step.2: Open the share menu via a button in the bottom bar that looks like this:
pages.downloadAndInstall.desktop.title: Desktop or Laptop Devices
pages.downloadAndInstall.desktop.instruc: To install RecipeSage on desktop or laptop devices:
pages.downloadAndInstall.desktop.step.2: Open the browser menu via the button in the top right corner that looks like this:
pages.downloadAndInstall.bookmark.instru: Drag this link to your bookmarks bar. Click the bookmark to import the current site you're on.
pages.downloadAndInstall.bookmark.descri: Automatically grabs recipe content from webpages. The browser extension is recommended instead of this bookmark.
pages.downloadAndInstall.extension.descr: Automatically grabs recipe content from webpages, and has greater compatibility across websites that might not import via the in-app importer.
pages.labelsPopover.title: Options
pages.labels.title: Manage Labels & Categories
pages.labels.label.sectionDescription: You have {{count}} total labels. Click a label to view.
pages.labels.label.nullState.1: You don't have any labels yet.
pages.labels.label.nullState.2: Click the + button to create a new label.
pages.labels.modal.delete.message: This will permanently delete the selected labels from your account. This action is irreversible. The following labels will be deleted: {{labelTitles}}
pages.labels.group.sectionDescription: You have {{count}} total label categories. Click a category to edit.
pages.labels.group.nullState.1: You don't have any label categories yet.

pages.newLabelItemModal.title: New Label or Label Category
pages.newLabelItemModal.label: Create a label
pages.newLabelItemModal.labelDescription: Labels can be attached to recipes to organize & filter them later. Some common label examples are "breakfast", "dessert", and "vegetarian"
pages.newLabelItemModal.groupDescription: Label categories can be used to organize labels into groups, such as "meal", or "diet". For example, you might put the labels "breakfast", "lunch", and "dinner" under a label category called "meal". Each category will be displayed separately when editing a recipe.
pages.newLabelItemModal.labelTitleInputH: Many people start simple labels such as "breakfast", "dessert", or "vegetarian"
pages.manageLabelGroupModal.title: Manage Label Category
pages.manageLabelGroupModal.warn: Warn me when I do not add
pages.manageLabelGroupModal.warnDescript: When enabled, you will be warned if saving a recipe without a label in this category attached
pages.manageLabelGroupModal.labelsHint: Selected labels will be grouped under this category. A given label can belong to at maximum 1 category at a time.
pages.manageLabelGroupModal.conflictMess: A label category with that title already exists
pages.manageLabelGroupModal.delete.messa: The label category "{{title}}" will be deleted. Note: this action will not affect any labels within this category.
pages.manageLabelModal.title: Manage Label: {{name}}
pages.manageLabelModal.noGroup: Is not assigned to a label category
pages.manageLabelModal.renameConflict.me: A label with that title already exists
pages.manageLabelModal.deleteWithRecipes: This will delete the label {{name}}, along with any recipes that have this label attached to them.
pages.manageLabelModal.notFound.subHeade: The target label "{{name}}" was not found
pages.manageLabelModal.notFound.message: You must enter the title for an existing label to merge into.
pages.manageLabelModal.selfMerge.subHead: The source and target labels must be different labels
pages.manageLabelModal.mergeComplete.sub: Label "{{sourceTitle}}" has been merged into "{{targetTitle}}" successfully
pages.manageLabelModal.mergeComplete.mes: The label "{{sourceTitle}}" has been deleted - you'll find all it's recipes moved to "{{targetTitle}}".
pages.manageLabelModal.merge.subHeader: What label would you like to merge "{{title}}" with?
pages.manageLabelModal.merge.message: All recipes in "{{title}}" will be relabeled with the target label instead, and the label "{{title}}" will be removed.
pages.mealPlan.title: Meal Plan - {{name}}
pages.mealPlan.modal.emptyDays.message: The day(s) you've selected do not contain any meal plan items. You'll need to select at least one day with meal plan items.
pages.mealPlan.modal.copy.message: This will copy the meal items on the selected days to a series of days starting on the day you select. Please click the day you'd like to copy to.
pages.mealPlan.modal.move.message: This will move the meal items on the selected days to a series of days starting on the day you select. Please click the day you'd like to move to.
pages.mealPlan.modal.delete.message: This will delete all items on {{daysList}}
pages.mealPlan.modal.noRecipes.message:
The selected days contain no recipes.
Keep in mind that only meal items that are recipes can be added to the shopping list.
You cannot add manually entered meal items to the shopping list from here.
pages.mealPlan.modal.copyConfirm.message: This will copy the meal items on {{selectedDayList}} to {{destDay}}
This will copy the meal items on {{selectedDayList}} to the days on and following {{destDay}}
pages.mealPlan.modal.moveConfirm.message: This will move the meal items on {{selectedDayList}} to {{destDay}}
This will move the meal items on {{selectedDayList}} to the days on and following {{destDay}}
pages.mealPlanBulkPinModal.title: Pin Meal Items
pages.mealPlanBulkPinModal.instructions1: Select the meal items that you'd like to pin open.
pages.mealPlanBulkPinModal.instructions2: Note: You can only pin items that are linked to recipes.
pages.mealPlanItemDetailsModal.title: Meal Plan Item Details
pages.mealPlanItemDetailsModal.actions.a: Add this recipe to shopping list
pages.mealPlanItemDetailsModal.delete.me: This will remove "{{title}}" from this meal plan.

pages.mealPlanPopover.actions.title: Actions
pages.mealPlanPopover.dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
pages.mealPlanPopover.delete.message: This will permanently remove this meal plan from your account. Note: If you're only a collaborator on this meal plan, it'll only be removed from your account. If you own this meal plan, it will be removed from all other collaborators accounts.
pages.mealPlans.title: Meal Plans
pages.mealPlans.toCreate: To create a meal plan, press the plus button in the bottom corner.

pages.shareMealPlanModal.title: Share Meal Plan
pages.shareMealPlanModal.description: The iCal/ICS link below can be used in almost any calendar program to sync your meal plan outside of RecipeSage
pages.assistant.title: Cooking Assistant
pages.assistant.welcome.1: Welcome to the RecipeSage cooking assistant!
pages.assistant.welcome.2: The cooking assistant is an AI model that can respond to your cooking questions and help create recipes.
pages.assistant.welcome.3: The cooking assistant has a message limit of 5 messages/day because of the high costs to run the AI. This limit is increased to 50 messages/day for contributors.
pages.assistant.messageLimit: Maximum messages reached (sorry, it's costly!). Message count resets at 0:00GMT.

pages.messageThread.yourRecipeDeleted: Your copy of this recipe no longer exists
pages.messageThread.recipeCopySent: A copy of this recipe was sent

pages.messages.notificationsRequired: Notifications must be enabled for messaging to work properly.

Add Recipes To Shopping List

pages.editRecipe.clip.failed: Failed to autofill from that URL
pages.editRecipe.missingLabelGroup.title: Missing label group
pages.editRecipe.missingLabelGroup.messa: You've specified that the label group "{{groupName}}" should be required. You can turn this off via the my labels page.
pages.editRecipe.conflict.title: Duplicate Title
pages.editRecipe.conflict.message: A recipe with the title "{{title}}" already exists in your collection. You can choose to save anyway, or you can choose to rename the recipe to "{{uniqueTitle}}".
pages.editRecipe.addImage.message: Enter an image URL to be added to the recipe
pages.editRecipe.addImage.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid image URL

pages.account.description: Here you can update and change aspects about your account

pages.account.creds.instructions: To change a field above, tap the field, edit it, and press the save button that appears.

pages.account.bonus.title: Bonus Feature Status
pages.account.bonus.description: Contributors unlock certain features that are costly to host:
pages.account.bonus.automaticRenewal: (this will update automatically if subscribed monthly)
pages.account.dangerZone.title: Danger Zone!
pages.account.dangerZone.warning1: Be careful with these actions - they are permanent.
pages.account.dangerZone.warning2: You will be asked a to confirm any action you take here.
pages.account.dangerZone.description: These actions are irreversible and may take several minutes to complete.
pages.account.emailConflict: Sorry, an account with that email address already exists.
pages.account.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
pages.account.passwordLength: Passwords must be 6 characters or longer.
pages.account.passwordUpdated.message: Your password has been updated. You will need to log back in on any devices that use this account.
pages.account.deleteAllRecipes.header: Warning - You're about to delete all of your recipes!
pages.account.deleteAllRecipes.message: This action is PERMANENT. All of your recipes and associated labels will be removed from the RecipeSage system.
pages.account.deleteAllRecipes.success: Your recipe data has been deleted.
pages.account.deleteAccount.message: This is IRREVERSIBLE and will completely remove all of your data from RecipeSage. This may take several minutes.
pages.export.title: Export
pages.export.description1: After selecting to export your data, a file will begin to download. You may have to press "allow".
pages.export.description2: The exported file will contain all of your recipes in the selected format.
pages.export.description3: Note: If you plan to re-import the data later, you'll need to select JSON-LD format.
pages.import.title: Import
pages.import.description1: RecipeSage supports importing from Pepperplate, Living Cookbook, and Paprika.
pages.import.description2: Importing recipes will add all recipes from the file/account you've selected to your RecipeSage account.
pages.import.description3: If you're having trouble with the import, please send me an email.
pages.importJsonLD.title: Import Recipes from JSON-LD File
pages.importJsonLD.description1: This will import a JSON-LD (ends in .json) file into RecipeSage (this is one of the file formats exported by RecipeSage).
pages.importJsonLD.description2: The import task can take several minutes
pages.importJsonLD.description3: It depends on the format and size of your file
pages.importJsonLD.description4: If you're having trouble with the import, send me an email with the file and I can import it manually.
pages.importJsonLD.description5: If your file is very large, you may have trouble importing it via this interface due to browser limitations.
pages.importJsonLD.description6: Please consider donating if your file contains a large number of recipes or images.
pages.importJsonLD.fileTypeWarning: Warning! This filetype does not end in .json. It may not work!
pages.importJsonLD.fileTooLarge: This file is too large to upload directly.
pages.importJsonLD.fileTooLarge.contact: Please contact me to have your database imported manually.
pages.importJsonLD.error: Hmm, we had trouble extracting that file. Please make sure it is in JSON-LD format. If you're having trouble, please feel free to send me an email.
pages.importJsonLD.timeout: The import is taking a while (this can happen if your database is very large) - please check back in 5 minutes. If your recipes do not appear, please send me an email.
pages.importCookmate.title: Import Recipes from Cookmate File
pages.importCookmate.description1: This will import a Cookmate (ends in .mcb) file into RecipeSage.
pages.importCookmate.description2: The import task can take several minutes
pages.importCookmate.description3: It depends on the format and size of your file
pages.importCookmate.description4: If you're having trouble with the import, send me an email with the file and I can import it manually.
pages.importCookmate.description5: If your file is very large, you may have trouble importing it via this interface due to browser limitations.
pages.importCookmate.description6: Please consider donating if your file contains a large number of recipes or images.
pages.importCookmate.fileTypeWarning: Warning! This filetype does not end in .mcb. It may not work!
pages.importCookmate.fileTooLarge: This file is too large to upload directly.
pages.importCookmate.fileTooLarge.contac: Please contact me to have your database imported manually.
pages.importCookmate.error: Hmm, we had trouble extracting that file. Please make sure it is in Cookmate format. If you're having trouble, please feel free to send me an email.
pages.importCookmate.timeout: The import is taking a while (this can happen if your database is very large) - please check back in 5 minutes. If your recipes do not appear, please send me an email.
pages.importLivingCookbook.title: Import Recipes from Living Cookbook
pages.importLivingCookbook.description1: This will import your Living Cookbook database into RecipeSage.
pages.importLivingCookbook.betaWarning: Please note this feature is in beta.
pages.importLivingCookbook.description2: All files must be in .lcb, .fdx or .fdxz format. Other formats will not work.
pages.importLivingCookbook.timeWarning: The import task can take several minutes
pages.importLivingCookbook.timeWarning.d: It depends on the format and size of your database file
pages.importLivingCookbook.contactMe: If you're having trouble with the import, send me an email with the database file and I can import it manually.
pages.importLivingCookbook.sizeWarning: If your database file is very large, you may have trouble importing it via this interface due to browser limitations.
pages.importLivingCookbook.donate: Please consider donating if your database contains a large number of recipes or images.
pages.importLivingCookbook.step1.include: Include stock "filler" LCB recipes (optional, not recommended)
Copy techniques to recipe notes (optional, not recommended)
pages.importLivingCookbook.step2.fileTyp: Warning! This filetype does not end in .lcb, .fdx, or .fdxz. It may not work.
pages.importLivingCookbook.step2.sizeWar: It may take a very long time to upload depending on your internet connection.
If you're having trouble, please contact me to have your database imported manually.
pages.importLivingCookbook.step2.sizeErr: This file is too large to upload directly.
Please contact me to have your database imported manually.
pages.importLivingCookbook.troubleshooti: If you find that the import isn't importing all of your recipes:
Try selecting the option above for "Include stock 'filler' LCB recipes" and try again.
You might also try exporting your recipes from LivingCookbook as .FDX or .FDXZ format and uploading in that format instead.
If the import is taking a long time:
Depending on your internet speed, database size, and image content, the import may take a long time.
If your database is too large:
Please upload your database file to a service such as Google Drive and send me a link. I'll import it for you.
pages.importLivingCookbook.error: Hmm, we had trouble extracting that file. Please make sure it is in .lcb format. If you're having trouble, please feel free to send me an email.
pages.importLivingCookbook.timeout: The import is taking a while (this can happen if your database is very large) - please check back in 5 minutes. If your recipes do not appear, please send me an email.
pages.importPaprika.title: Import Recipes from Paprika File
pages.importPaprika.description1: This will import your Paprika export file into RecipeSage. Please note this feature is in beta.
pages.importPaprika.description2: All files must be in .paprikarecipes format (export as Paprika Recipe Format in Paprika settings). Other formats will not work.
pages.importPaprika.description3: The import task can take several minutes
pages.importPaprika.description4: It depends on the format and size of your file
pages.importPaprika.description5: If you're having trouble with the import, send me an email with the file and I can import it manually.
pages.importPaprika.description6: If your file is very large, you may have trouble importing it via this interface due to browser limitations.
pages.importPaprika.description7: Please consider donating if your file contains a large number of recipes or images.
pages.importPaprika.description8: Warning! This filetype does not end in .paprikarecipes
pages.importPaprika.error: Hmm, we had trouble extracting that file. Please make sure it is in Paprika Recipe Format directly from the app. If you're having trouble, please feel free to send me an email.
pages.importPaprika.timeout: The import is taking a while (this can happen if your database is very large) - please check back in 5 minutes. If your recipes do not appear, please send me an email.
pages.importPepperplate.title: Import Recipes from Pepperplate
pages.importPepperplate.description1: The import task can take several minutes and depends on the availability of Pepperplate servers.
pages.importPepperplate.description2: You will only see the imported recipes in your library once the full import task is complete.
pages.importPepperplate.description3: If you have issues with the import process, feel free to reach out.
pages.importPepperplate.description4: Note: If you have a very large recipe collection your browser may time out before the import is complete, resulting in an error.
pages.importPepperplate.description5: To avoid creating duplicates, please check the "My Recipes" page before trying the import again.
pages.importPepperplate.description6: If duplicates are created accidentally, you can use the "delete all recipes" button on the account page to start over.
pages.importPepperplate.description7: Please enter the credentials associated with your Pepperplate account:
pages.importPepperplate.invalid.message: Pepperplate rejected those credentials. Please try again.
pages.importPepperplate.timeout.header: This is taking a little longer than expected
pages.importPepperplate.timeout.message: This can happen when Pepperplate is under heavy load. The import is still in progress. If you don't see your recipes appear, feel free to email me.
pages.importPepperplate.error.message: An error occurred - Please check your My Recipes page before starting a new import to avoid creating duplicates.
pages.settings.title: Settings
pages.settings.section1.title: Data & Account
pages.settings.section2.title: General Settings
pages.settings.splitPane: Enable Split Pane View on Large Screens
pages.settings.language.contribute: Contact me to contribute a language
pages.settings.offline.error: There was an error while syncing. Please report this.
pages.settings.preferencesSync.message: You must select whether you want to override the synced settings in the cloud with the local settings on this device, or override the settings on this device with the settings from the cloud.
pages.settings.resetPrefs.message: Resetting your preferences will set all app preferences back to their default state. This includes preferences set via menus on the home page, meal plans page, shopping list page, etc. Note: This only affects this device.
pages.settings.oled.message: The black (OLED) theme may make it difficult to distinguish between elements and alerts. Shadows and other visual animations will also not be displayed.
pages.settings.update.subHeader: The app will reload to check for an update.
pages.share.title: Share Recipe
pages.share.description: When sharing, a copy of this recipe will be sent to the recipient. Your copy will not be affected.
pages.share.byAccount.description: Recipient must have a RecipeSage account. If you'd like to share with a non-RecipeSage user, use the link sharing option.
pages.share.byEmbed.copy: Copy the code below and paste it into your website HTML

pages.shoppingList.nullState.1: There are no items in this shopping list.
pages.shoppingList.nullState.2: Use the menu in the upper right hand corner to enable or disable automatic grouping.
pages.shoppingList.removeMultiple.messag: This will permanently delete these items from this list.
pages.shoppingListPopover.title: Options
pages.shoppingListPopover.sortBy.title: Title
pages.shoppingListPopover.removeAll.head: Confirm Removal
pages.shoppingListPopover.removeAll.mess: This will permanently delete all items from this list. This action is irreversible.
pages.shoppingListPopover.deleteList.mes: This will permanently remove this shopping list from your account. Note: If you're only a collaborator on this list, it'll only be removed from your account. If you own this list, it will be removed from all other collaborators accounts.
pages.shoppingLists.title: Shopping Lists
pages.shoppingLists.nullState.2: To create a shopping list, press the plus button in the bottom corner.
pages.shoppingListIgnoreModal.title: Shopping List Item Ignore List
pages.shoppingListIgnoreModal.descriptio: Items listed here will be automatically excluded when adding a recipe to a shopping list. This is particularly handy for ingredients such as salt, which you likely don't need added every time you add an item to a shopping list.
pages.shoppingListIgnoreModal.instructio: Each entry should be on it's own line. Entries will match an ingredient if the ingredient contains any part of the line. If you enter "salt", it will match "1 tbsp sea salt finely ground".
pages.shoppingListIgnoreModal.label: Ignore list
pages.shoppingListIgnoreModal.placeholde: Keywords to ignore, each on their own line
pages.addFriendModal.title: Find User
pages.addFriendModal.profileWarning: Note: The desired user must have enabled their profile.

pages.myProfile.setup1: Before you get started, there are a few things that you'll need to set up.

pages.myProfile.name: Name/Nickname
pages.myProfile.setup2: Now, choose the handle for your profile, for example: @superchef
pages.myProfile.handle.unique: Note: Handle must be unique, and must not contain any special characters.

pages.myProfile.nullState.2: To add your first profile item, click the "add" button to the right.
pages.myProfile.notEnabled.message: You'll need to enable your profile to interact with sharing features, such as sending friend requests.

You'll need to save your changes before you can view what your profile looks like.

services.quickTutorial.multipleRecipeSel: You're now in multiple recipe selection mode. You can click as many recipes as you'd like to select, then use the buttons that appear in the header to take bulk actions such as labelling or deleting. You can exit multiple recipe selection mode at any time by clicking the X in the header, or via the options menu.
services.quickTutorial.multipleLabelSele: You're now in multiple label selection mode. You can click as many labels as you'd like to select, then use the buttons that appear in the header to take bulk actions. You can exit multiple label selection mode at any time by clicking the X in the header, or via the options menu.
services.quickTutorial.splitPaneView.mes: Split pane view is only visible on devices with large screens (laptops, large tablets, etc). When split pane view is enabled, the side menu will always be visible. This feature is useful for optimizing the experience on larger devices.
services.quickTutorial.experimentalOffli: Experimental offline cache is a test feature. RecipeSage normally caches recipes you access automatically, but this will now fetch all of your recipes in the background. Your system may remove cached recipes automatically if it needs the storage, or when you do not use the app for long periods of time. Important note: Filtering by label and searching will not work. This may work in future implementations, but not for this test implementation.
services.quickTutorial.pinnedRecipes.mes: This recipe is now pinned! Pinning recipes provides a quick way to jump between multiple recipes quickly while cooking. Pinned recipes appear in the toolbar at the bottom of the screen. You'll see a bubble with the recipe image and the first letter of the recipe title. Pinned recipes will stay open until they are unpinned or until you close the application.
services.unsavedChanges.message: It looks like you have been editing something. If you leave before saving, your changes will be lost.
errors.offline: It looks like you're offline. While offline, we're only able to fetch data you've previously accessed on this device.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again. If the problem continues to occur, please contact me.
